document_data.caption: Gorg knows how to make an entrance.
document_data.name: Gorg
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gorg''' was a [[hobgoblin]] prisoner at the [[Revel's End]] prison on the [[Frozenfar]] in the late 1490s [[DR]].{{Cite video/Honor Among Thieves}}{{HAT-time}}
{{quote|Been in a lot of cells. Never shared one with a female. Think I'm gonna like it.|Gorg, being that guy}}
document_data.Description: Standing some {{SI|7|feet|long=yes}}, Gorg had pointed ears, jagged teeth, and long black hair, and was muscular and heavily scarred.
document_data.History:
[[File:Quest Begins - Gorg.jpg|thumb|right|''Gorg tries to make friends.'']]
For unspecified crimes, Gorg was transported to the Revel's End prison on the coast of the [[Sea of Moving Ice]]. On the sleigh ride there, however, even whilst [[manacles|manacled]] hand and foot,Short of an overcrowded prison population, it seems that the guards expected for Holga to beat Gorg up for them.
